#summary avs3a installation instructions
#labels Featured
=Create a working directory=

{{{
mkdir -p /usr/local/src/avs3a
cd /usr/local/src/avs3a
}}}

=Extract the source=

{{{
tar xfz ~/Desktop/avs3a-yyyy-mm-dd-xx.tar.gz
}}}

=Build=

{{{
make
make install
}}} 
May need to be:
{{{
sudo make install
}}}
